data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Min, Li, Sheng-Cai, Fan, Qing-Hai (2015): Mites and ticks (Acari) in Shanxi Province, China: an annotated checklist. Zootaxa 4006 (1): 1-39, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4006.1.1
